column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Roasted Chicken- Both the server and hostess recommended the chicken so my coworker decided to try it
column2: and she couldn't stop raving about it.  I had a bite
column3: and normally I think chicken is just whatever but I have to say that this was probably the most delicious chicken I've ever tasted. It was moist
column5: it was the chicken equivalent of my steak!
